title: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The behavior mentioned in Chapter 7.1.1 of Servlet 3.0 specification regarding custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting is not observed in the current trunk.
EB: The Servlet 3.0 specification should be updated to reflect the actual behavior, where the default 'jsessionid' is used for URL rewriting instead of the custom cookie name.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Deploy the provided war file named 'cookiename.war'.
2. Access the following URL: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
